cause.description:
Chords for a Cure was started in Fall of 2004 and has since thrown a show (roughly) once a month. Sometimes it's a live show and other times it's simply a dance.
The charities it's helped raise money for have been Penn State Delco THON, Invisible Children, City of LIfe, Salvation Army, Luekemia Society and Katrina Victims among other charities.
1. Matt Kelly - Founder
cause.mission: Raise money for various charities through local events
cause.name: Chords For a Cure
